events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection around 8 AM, involving two vehicles.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the details and confirming vehicle involvement.
Assigned insurance agent Michael Thompson to handle the investigation and customer communications.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim to the customer and assured prompt processing and follow-up.
Requested customer to submit police report, photos of damages, and driver's license for claim verification.
Received requested documents including police report and vehicle damage photographs from the claimant.
Investigation began with review of submitted documents and contacting witness mentioned in the police report.
Completed investigation confirming fault due to another driver running a red light at the time of collision.
Proposed settlement covering car repairs and rental expenses while vehicle is in the shop.
Customer expressed satisfaction with quick response and clear explanations regarding their claim process.
Approved claim for the full amount required to repair the damaged vehicle as outlined in the estimate.
Issued payment directly to the repair shop and rental company as per the agreed settlement terms.
Closed the claim after full payment and confirmation that repairs have been completed satisfactorily.
